items.title: 悉尼附近的一家Apple Store将于下月永久关闭 (原标题: Apple Store Near Sydney Permanently Closing Next Month)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 悉尼附近Apple Store永久关闭
## Hornsby门店将于下月关闭，员工将转移至Chatswood Chase

Apple公司宣布，其位于澳大利亚悉尼霍恩斯比（Hornsby）Westfield Hornsby购物中心的Apple Store将于下月永久关闭。

### 关闭详情
*   **地点**: 澳大利亚悉尼上北岸郊区霍恩斯比（Hornsby）的Westfield Hornsby购物中心。
*   **关闭日期**: 2025年10月4日下午5点（当地时间）。
*   **开业时间**: 该门店于2011年开业。
*   **关闭原因**: Apple决定不再续签Westfield Hornsby的租约。

![Apple Store Logo](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JwZwggkauAVC0S4RAP_SI4-2ro4=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Apple-Store-Logo.jpg?lossy)

### 员工安置与Chatswood Chase门店重开
Apple表示，所有受影响的零售员工都将有机会在Apple位于Chatswood Chase购物中心的附近门店工作。Chatswood Chase门店也位于悉尼的Chatswood区，在经过数月翻新后，计划于10月重新开业。

*   **Chatswood Chase门店特色**:
    *   将进行全面重新设计。
    *   将提供一个Apple Pickup取货站，方便顾客领取在线订单。
    *   将设有一个专门的“Today at Apple”课程区域。

Apple决定关闭Hornsby门店，正是因为Chatswood Chase门店的扩建计划。

![Apple Hornsby](https://images.macrumors.com/t/cdbhGvdcy6vHl7ODdN6_TD9-9zc=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Apple-Hornsby.jpeg?lossy)
*Apple Hornsby门店*

### Apple在悉尼及全球的门店策略
*   **悉尼地区**: Apple在悉尼地区仍有六家其他门店。
*   **全球范围**: 2025年，Apple关闭了少数门店，但也在全球范围内开设了许多新店，包括迈阿密、深圳、大阪、班加罗尔等地。
*   **近期动态**: Apple还宣布其位于底特律市中心的新店将于9月19日（周五）下午5点（当地时间）盛大开业。在澳大利亚的其他地区，Apple于6月将其珀斯（Perth）门店迁至一栋历史悠久的银行大楼。
items.shortSummary: Apple宣布将于10月4日永久关闭其位于悉尼Hornsby的Apple Store。此举是由于公司决定不续签租约。所有受影响的员工将被安排到附近Chatswood Chase购物中心经过翻新和扩建后将于10月重开的Apple Store工作。Chatswood Chase门店将提供Apple Pickup和Today at Apple区域。此次关闭是Apple优化其零售布局策略的一部分，尽管关闭了一些门店，但Apple在全球范围内也开设了许多新店。
items.translated_title: 悉尼附近的一家Apple Store将于下月永久关闭
items.content:
Apple today announced its store at the Westfield Hornsby shopping mall, in Hornsby, Australia, will be permanently closing next month.


Hornsby is a suburb of Sydney, on the Upper North Shore. Apple opened its store there in 2011, and it will close for good on October 4, at 5 p.m. local time.

In a statement shared with some Australian media outlets a few months ago, Apple said it had decided not to renew its lease at Westfield Hornsby. Apple said all affected retail employees would be given the opportunity to work at Apple's nearby store at the Chatswood Chase shopping mall, in Chatswood, which is set to reopen in October.

Apple Hornsby

Apple Chatswood Chase has been closed for renovations for many months. Apple said the store will be completely redesigned, and it will offer an Apple Pickup station for collecting online orders, and a dedicated area for Today at Apple sessions. With the Chatswood Chase store set to expand, Apple decided to close its Hornsby store.

The company has six other stores in the Sydney area.

Apple has permanently closed a handful of its stores in 2025, but it has also opened many new locations this year, including in Miami, Shenzhen, Osaka, Bengaluru, and elsewhere. Earlier today, Apple announced that its all-new store in Downtown Detroit will be holding its grand opening on Friday, September 19, at 5 p.m. local time.

Elsewhere in Australia, Apple relocated its store in Perth to a historic bank building in June.

items.title: 距离iOS 26发布还有三天：你最期待什么？ (原标题: Three Days Until iOS 26 Launch: What Are You Most Looking Forward To?)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 距离iOS 26发布还有三天：主要更新与热门新闻

### iOS 26即将发布

距离iOS 26的正式发布仅剩三天（2025年9月12日），此次更新将带来一系列引人注目的新特性和设计改进。

#### 全新Liquid Glass设计

*   **视觉效果：** 引入了全新的Liquid Glass设计语言，特点是半透明的用户界面元素、圆角菜单栏、简化的导航以及弹出式菜单。
*   **用户反馈：** 在测试期间，Liquid Glass设计引发了争议，部分用户认为透明度不足，而另一些用户则认为透明度过高，影响了可读性。

#### 其他新功能

除了设计更新，iOS 26还包含多项新功能，包括：

*   **电话呼叫筛选：** 允许用户更好地管理来电。
*   **自定义贪睡时长：** 提供更灵活的闹钟设置。
*   **Genmoji：** 引入新的表情符号生成功能。
*   **实时翻译（Live Translation）：** 提供即时语言翻译服务（但需注意欧盟地区的限制）。

#### 相关资源

文章建议查阅iOS 26的全面概述，以及iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe的概览，这些系统也都有令人兴奋的新增功能。

![iOS 26 on iPhone Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ULciynKusakzMLK0UZMhMEvls6A=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26-on-iPhone-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 热门相关新闻

文章还列举了近期一些热门的苹果产品新闻：

*   **iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max发布：**
    *   于2025年9月9日发布，采用全新铝制一体式设计。
    *   前后均由陶瓷护盾（Ceramic Shield）保护，前部为Ceramic Shield 2（抗刮擦能力提升3倍），后部抗裂能力比前代背板玻璃提升4倍。

*   **iPhone 17系列在部分国家仅支持eSIM：**
    *   苹果继续逐步淘汰实体SIM卡托盘，iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max在巴林、加拿大、关岛、日本、科威特、墨西哥、阿曼、卡塔尔、沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋等国家和地区仅支持eSIM。

*   **AirPods实时翻译功能在欧盟受限：**
    *   由于严格的欧盟法规，AirPods的实时翻译功能将不对欧盟地区的用户开放，如果用户身处欧盟且其Apple账户区域也在欧盟，则无法使用此功能。

*   **iPhone 17系列发布日期和预购：**
    *   苹果于9月9日发布了iPhone 17、超薄iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max。
    *   所有新款iPhone型号将于9月12日太平洋时间上午5点/东部时间上午8点开始预购。

*   **iPhone 18 Pro传闻：**
    *   尽管iPhone 18 Pro和iPhone 18 Pro Max尚有一年时间，但已有关于屏下Face ID等早期传闻。

*   **iPhone 17系列电池容量公布：**
    *   苹果已确认iPhone 17、iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max的电池容量，这些信息在欧盟的能源标签上有所披露。

*   **iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone Air基准测试：**
    *   A19 Pro芯片在iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max和iPhone Air上的初步Geekbench 6基准测试结果显示，其多核CPU性能比A18 Pro芯片快13%至15%。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26将于三天后发布，引入Liquid Glass设计和多项新功能，包括呼叫筛选、Genmoji和实时翻译，但新设计引发了争议。同时，文章还涵盖了近期苹果产品的热门新闻，如iPhone 17 Pro/Max的发布、部分地区仅支持eSIM、AirPods实时翻译在欧盟受限、iPhone 17系列的预购信息、电池容量以及A19 Pro芯片的性能基准测试。
items.translated_title: 距离iOS 26发布还有三天：你最期待什么？
items.content:
iOS 26 is coming in just three days, and it brings a new Liquid Glass design with translucent UI elements, rounded menu bars, simplified navigation, pop out menus, and more.


Liquid Glass has been contentious during the beta testing period. Some people don't feel like there's enough translucency, and others think Apple has gone too far, impacting readability. Where do you fall on the spectrum? Let us know in the comments below.

The new design is the big ‌iOS 26‌ talking point, but the update also has a bunch of new features, both big and small. Are you looking forward to screening your phone calls? Setting a custom snooze duration? Making Genmoji? Using Live Translation?

For a recap on all of the features that are coming next week, make sure to check out our iOS 26 roundup. We also have overviews of iPadOS 26 and macOS Tahoe, both of which have some exciting new additions.

items.title: 苹果公布即将推出的更多iOS应用液态玻璃图标 (原标题: Apple Reveals Upcoming Liquid Glass Icons for Additional iOS Apps)
items.creator: Steve Moser
items.summary:
### 苹果即将为更多iOS应用推出液态玻璃图标

**发布时间与来源**
*   2025年9月12日，史蒂夫·莫泽报道。
*   在周二的活动之后，针对Apple Store、Clips、GarageBand、iMovie、Keynote、Numbers和Pages等应用的全新“液态玻璃”图标已在苹果的iPhone技术规格页面上浮现。
*   这些新图标出现在iPhone 16的技术规格页面上，尽管该型号没有硬件变化。
*   现有用户预计将在周一随iOS 26推出的应用更新中看到这些新图标。

**设计与更新细节**
*   这些应用预装在新iPhone上，但由于它们通过App Store更新，因此未包含在iOS 26的测试版和发布候选版中。
*   图标设计无疑已更新至最新的iOS设计语言，以“液态玻璃”为核心。
*   大多数更新相对微妙，变化主要限于设计元素的玻璃质感。
*   少数应用，如Clips和GarageBand，则有更实质性的变化。

**跨平台一致性问题与未来展望**
*   目前苹果的产品页面存在不一致性：所有iPhone型号页面都显示了这些新图标，但所有Mac产品页面仍显示这些应用当前的macOS版本图标。
*   预计Mac硬件更新将在今年晚些时候或2026年初。
*   随着macOS Tahoe与iOS 26同步在周一发布，预计Mac版App Store应用也将迎来“液态玻璃”图标。

**图片**
![iOS 26 其他应用图标](https://images.macrumors.com/t/S5h7_pPMe5Np31V5P7G8yh1lkZI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-other-app-icons.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已在iPhone技术规格页面上展示了Apple Store、Clips、GarageBand、iMovie、Keynote、Numbers和Pages等iOS应用的全新“液态玻璃”图标。这些图标预计将随iOS 26在周一通过应用更新向现有用户推出。新设计以玻璃质感为核心，多数变化微妙，但Clips和GarageBand等应用有更显著的更新。目前Mac页面仍显示旧图标，但预计macOS Tahoe发布后，Mac版应用也将更新为“液态玻璃”风格。
items.translated_title: 苹果公布即将推出的更多iOS应用液态玻璃图标
items.content:
Following Tuesday's event, new Liquid Glass icons for Apple Store, Clips, GarageBand, iMovie, Keynote, Numbers, and Pages have surfaced on Apple's iPhone tech spec pages. The new icons appear on the iPhone 16 tech specs page despite that model having no hardware changes, and existing users will presumably see the new icons in app updates that will roll out on Monday alongside iOS 26.

‌iOS 26‌ icons

These apps come preinstalled on new iPhones but they were not included in the ‌iOS 26‌ betas and release candidate because they are updated through the App Store. While the spec sheets themselves don't reveal changes beyond the usual pre-installed and downloadable apps, the iconography is unmistakably updated to the latest iOS design set based around Liquid Glass.

Most of the updates are relatively subtle with changes largely limited to the glassiness of the design elements, while a few like Clips and GarageBand have a bit more substantial changes.

iOS 18 icons

Perhaps notably, there is inconsistency across Apple's product pages. While every ‌iPhone‌ model page displays these new icons, all Mac product pages continue to show the current macOS versions of these app icons.

We are not expecting Mac hardware updates until later this year, or more likely early 2026, but with macOS Tahoe being released alongside ‌iOS 26‌ on Monday, we should see the Liquid Glass app icons coming to Apple's ‌App Store‌ apps for Mac as well.

Related Forum: iOS 26

items.title: 苹果不再单独销售30W充电器，但仍随两款设备附赠 (原标题: Apple No Longer Sells 30W Charger Still Included With Two Devices)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 苹果停止单独销售30W USB-C电源适配器

苹果公司本周已停止单独销售其30W USB-C电源适配器，尽管其在线商店仍显示该充电器随基础款13英寸MacBook Air和Apple Vision Pro附赠。目前尚不清楚苹果为何停止单独销售这款适配器。

*   **历史与定价：** 这款30W USB-C电源适配器于2018年发布，在美国的售价为39美元，之后便从苹果在线商店下架。

*   **潜在替代品：** 苹果本周在美国、加拿大、中国、日本、墨西哥、台湾和菲律宾发布了一款新的40W动态电源适配器，其峰值功率可达60W。这款新充电器可能成为30W型号的继任者。
    *   **新充电器特性：** 尽管外形更小巧，但这款新充电器能够动态提供高达60W的功率。
    *   **功率限制：** 由于紧凑设计带来的散热限制，60W的峰值功率只能在较短的时间内达到。

*   **其他可用充电器：** 苹果还销售多种其他USB-C电源适配器，包括20W、双端口35W（两种尺寸）、70W、96W和140W等选项。

![30W USB C Power Adapter](https://images.macrumors.com/t/DElRIcLsAkX0Vwwy7N5Rn9wn_JM=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/30W-USB-C-Power-Adapter.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已停止单独销售其30W USB-C电源适配器，但该充电器仍随13英寸MacBook Air和Apple Vision Pro附赠。停售原因不明。作为潜在替代品，苹果发布了一款新的40W动态电源适配器，其峰值功率可达60W，但受散热限制，60W功率只能短时输出。苹果还提供多种其他功率的USB-C充电器。
items.translated_title: 苹果不再单独销售30W充电器，但仍随两款设备附赠
items.content:
Apple this week stopped selling its 30W USB-C Power Adapter, despite its online store indicating that the charger is still included with the base 13-inch MacBook Air and the Apple Vision Pro. It is unclear why the adapter is no longer sold separately.


Apple released the 30W USB-C Power Adapter in 2018. It was priced at $39 in the U.S., before being removed from Apple's online store.

In related news, Apple released a 40W Dynamic Power Adapter with 60W Max this week, in the U.S., Canada, China, Japan, Mexico, Taiwan, and the Philippines. Perhaps this new 40W-60W charger is the successor to the 30W model.

The new charger can dynamically deliver up to 60W of power, despite having a smaller form factor. However, due to the thermal limitations that come with this compact design, the charger can only reach that 60W peak in shorter bursts.

Apple also sells a variety of other USB-C power adapters, including 20W, dual-port 35W (in two sizes), 70W, 96W, and 140W options.

items.title: iOS 26 在部分国家/地区新增 AirPods Pro 听力保护设置 (原标题: iOS 26 Adds New AirPods Pro Hearing Protection Setting in Some Countries)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iOS 26 新增 AirPods Pro 听力保护设置

**发布日期：** 2025年9月12日

iOS 26 引入了一项针对 AirPods Pro 2 和 AirPods Pro 3 的新“听力保护”设置，旨在帮助用户在嘈杂环境中保护听力。

### 关键信息点：

*   **适用设备：** AirPods Pro 2 和 AirPods Pro 3。
*   **适用地区：** 该设置将在欧洲和中东的部分国家/地区推出，包括比利时、捷克、匈牙利、意大利、波兰、沙特阿拉伯、西班牙、土耳其和阿拉伯联合酋长国。
*   **具体设置名称：** 在这些国家/地区，新增了一个名为“EN 352 Protection”的设置。
*   **功能与标准：**
    *   当此设置开启时，AirPods Pro 2 和 AirPods Pro 3 的听力保护功能将符合欧洲听力保护标准 EN 352。
    *   它通过将媒体播放的最大音量限制在 82 dBA 来实现这一标准，从而减少用户暴露于高音量的声音。
*   **操作路径：**
    *   用户将 AirPods Pro 2 或 AirPods Pro 3 与 iPhone 配对后，可以在“设置”应用中找到并调整此设置。
    *   具体路径为：点击 AirPods -> 选择“听力保护”-> 调整“EN 352 Protection”开关。
*   **引入原因：** 目前尚不清楚苹果是强制要求引入此设置，还是自愿添加。
*   **发布时间：**
    *   iOS 26 将于 2025 年 9 月 15 日（星期一）向公众发布。
    *   AirPods Pro 3 已于 2025 年 9 月 12 日（星期五）开放预订，并将于 2025 年 9 月 19 日（星期五）正式发售。
*   **发现者：** MacRumors 贡献者 Aaron Perris 和 Steve Moser 发现了这项新设置。

![iPhone 17 AirPods Purple](https://images.macrumors.com/t/k3To18TLPPYqUuF37OJaLYem5oA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-airpods-purple.jpeg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26为AirPods Pro 2和AirPods Pro 3在部分欧洲和中东国家新增了“EN 352 Protection”听力保护设置。该功能将媒体播放最大音量限制在82 dBA，以符合欧洲EN 352标准，旨在有效保护用户听力。用户可在设置中开启或关闭此功能。iOS 26于9月15日发布，AirPods Pro 3于9月19日发售。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 在部分国家/地区新增 AirPods Pro 听力保护设置
items.content:
iOS 26 adds a new Hearing Protection setting for AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods Pro 3 in some countries across Europe and the Middle East, such as Belgium, Czechia, Hungary, Italy, Poland, Saudi Arabia, Spain, Türkiye, and the United Arab Emirates.


Specifically, there is a new "EN 352 Protection" setting in these countries. When this setting is turned on, Apple's website says the Hearing Protection feature on AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods Pro 3 complies with the European hearing protection standard EN 352, by limiting the maximum volume level of media playback to 82 dBA.

When a set of AirPods Pro 2 or AirPods Pro 3 are paired to an iPhone, this new setting can be turned on or off in the Settings app, by tapping on your AirPods, selecting Hearing Protection, and adjusting the "EN 352 Protection" toggle switch.

It is unclear if Apple was required to introduce this setting, or added it voluntarily.

iOS 26 will be released to the general public on Monday, September 15. AirPods Pro 3 are available to pre-order now, and launch on Friday, September 19.

With the overall Hearing Protection feature, AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods Pro 3 can help protect your hearing in loud environments, by reducing your exposure to loud sounds.

The new setting was discovered by MacRumors contributors Aaron Perris and Steve Moser.
